Data.text_description:
The probability of weather conditions being good (A=1) is 0.7675. 
The probability of amount of traffic on the road being smooth (B=1) is 0.3421. 
For those with amount of traffic on the road being congested (B=0) and weather conditions being bad (A=0), the probability of probability of a car accident being high (C=1) is 0.5784. 
For those with amount of traffic on the road being congested (B=0) and weather conditions being good (A=1), the probability of probability of a car accident being high (C=1) is 0.1927. 
For those with amount of traffic on the road being smooth (B=1) and weather conditions being bad (A=0), the probability of probability of a car accident being high (C=1) is 0.5149. 
For those with amount of traffic on the road being smooth (B=1) and weather conditions being good (A=1), the probability of probability of a car accident being high (C=1) is 0.1559. 
For those with weather conditions being bad (A=0), the probability of severity of injuries in a car accident being minor (D=1) is 0.8215. 
For those with weather conditions being good (A=1), the probability of severity of injuries in a car accident being minor (D=1) is 0.9070.
